event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU), the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: description
event_registry_properties.item: The number of correctable errors within a XB chip has exceeded an acceptable threshold.
event_registry_properties.name: details
event_registry_properties.item:
Correctable errors detected in the common logic internal to an XB chip.

The crossbar way is deconfigured the next time the platform is restarted.

   If this is the first crossbar way being deconfigured,
   then the platform will operate with reduced performance.

   If a crossbar way has already been deconfigured,
   then the platform will be powered down.


The recommended service action for this event is to schedule the replacement of the affected FRU's.

       LEGEND

      RED        = SUNW-MSG-ID
      BLUE     = EVENT_ID
      GREEN  = FRU


Step 1. Collect the fault message (use one of the following methods):


   Single-line fault message displayed on the XSCF console:

   Mar 27 15:31:43 nwk-dc2-1-sc0 fmd: SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12, CSN: nwk-dc2-1  
   EVENT-ID: a0222579-ed62-45ea-9ce8-88c5eb9bbbf8
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8006-KX for detailed information.


   Complete fault message using 'fmdump -m' on the XSCF console:

   MSG-ID: SCF-8006-KX, TYPE: Fault, VER: 1, SEVERITY: Major
   EVENT-TIME: Tue Mar 27 15:31:43 PDT 2007
   PLATFORM: SPARC-Enterprise, CSN: nwk-dc2-1, HOSTNAME: nwk-dc2-1-sc0
   SOURCE: sde, REV: 1.12
   EVENT-ID: a0222579-ed62-45ea-9ce8-88c5eb9bbbf8
   DESC: The number of correctable errors within a XB chip has exceeded an acceptable threshold.
   Refer to http://www.sun.com/msg/SCF-8006-KX for more information.
   AUTO-RESPONSE: The crossbar way is deconfigured the next time the platform is restarted. If this is the
   first crossbar way to be deconfigured, the platform will operate with reduced performance.
   If a crossbar way has already been deconfigured, the platform will be powered down.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
   IMPACT: No immediate impact. The crossbar way is deconfigured the next time the platform is restarted.
   If this is the first crossbar way to be deconfigured, the platform will operate with reduced
   performance. If a crossbar way has already been deconfigured, the platform will be powered down.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
   REC-ACTION: Schedule a repair action to replace the affected Field Replaceable Unit (FRU),
   the identity of which can be determined using fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID.
   Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.


Step 2. Collect the output from the 'fmdump -v -u EVENT_ID' command

   
   SPARC Enterprise platform example:
 
   xscf> fmdump -v -u a0222579-ed62-45ea-9ce8-88c5eb9bbbf8

         TIME                 UUID                                 MSG-ID
         Mar 27 15:31:43.7778 a0222579-ed62-45ea-9ce8-88c5eb9bbbf8 SCF-8006-KX
           100%  fault.chassis.SPARC-Enterprise.asic.xb.ce

                 Problem in: hc:///chassis=0/xbu=0/xb=0
                    Affects: hc:///chassis=0/xbu=0
                        FRU: hc://:product-id=SPARC-Enterprise:chassis-id=nwk-dc2-1:
                             server-id=nwk-dc2-1-sc0:serial=PP0639L444:
                             part=CA06620-D301 A6:revision=0201/component=/XBU_B#0


Step 3. Contact your Authorized Service Provider.


If you require additional information, please refer to InfoDoc #87402.
event_registry_properties.name: impact
event_registry_properties.item: No immediate impact. The crossbar way is deconfigured the next time the platform is restarted. If this is the first crossbar way to be deconfigured, the platform will operate with reduced performance. If a crossbar way has already been deconfigured, the platform will be powered down. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: response
event_registry_properties.item: The crossbar way is deconfigured the next time the platform is restarted. If this is the first crossbar way to be deconfigured, the platform will operate with reduced performance. If a crossbar way has already been deconfigured, the platform will be powered down. Please consult the detail section of the knowledge article for additional information.
event_registry_properties.name: title
event_registry_properties.item: Correctable errors within a XB chip have exceeded an acceptable threshold.
